name: Cir-Colors
description:
!The game is in Slovak language only, but it is not very important, because words are not important in this game.!
This is insane game about sorting circles, colorful circles.
If you want to play download the first file (exe) and if that does not work, please download the second one (zip) and have a fun!

Toto šialene dobrá hra o triedení kruhov, farebných kruhov.
Ak si chceš zahrať, stiahni si prvý súbor (exe), ak ti nefunguje, stiahni si druhý (zip). Prajem príjemnú zábavu!

:)
